value:
I see that Ephraim and Eirika have
joined our little beach excursion as
well. The more the merrier, I say!

Nothing can match the beauty of
Rausten's flawless shores, but this
Askran beach is breathtaking!

I must seek shade awhile. The sun is
in a jealous rage over my radiance.

I do wish that Dozla and Rennac were
here. This pristine water would wash
away their worries in an instant!

I, L'Arachel, shall purge this beach
of its vile villainy! Face the whacking
end of my parasol of justice!

Rejoice, for I have brought summer
tidings from $Nf!

Bear witness, O summer sun, for
the one who shall outshine even
your brilliance has arrived!

Even the waves congratulate me on
my performance as they crash upon
the rocks in thunderous applause!

My, the summer sun is a
formidable opponent indeed...

The glittering brilliance of summer
dwells within me!

I, L'Arachel, have arrived to dazzle
you all! Join me, and we shall enjoy
the summer to end all summers!

Glittering waves, a gentle breeze,
sun-soaked sand... What could make
for a more perfect summer scene?$k$pWhy, none other than the beautiful
princess of peerless beauty! I shall be
the crowning jewel of this tableau!$k$pYou must be so pleased to have the
opportunity to enjoy the summer
season at my side.$k$pAlas, it has been fight after fight since
my arrival. Heavy is the hand that
wields the hammer of justice...$k$pThat is not to say that our efforts
have been in vain, as we are able to
enjoy a moment of respite today.$k$pI pray that the memories we create
together under the sun's rays will
sustain us in the coming conflicts.$k$pMay the image of the midsummer
princess of peerless beauty remain
forever burning in your heart!
Cool down!
Behold the beach princess!
Behold the beach princess!
Stricken by my radiance.
Stricken by my radiance.
Rejoice! The game begins.
So hot...
L'Arachel, Midsummer Princess of Peerless Beauty, has arrived in splendor!
Oh! How thoughtful of you to prepare a cold drink for me!
I fear that in this swimwear there is nothing shielding the world from my blinding beauty... How distressing!
You split a melon with a large stick? And this is a game? Then don't tarry! Roll it out!
My, this frozen treat is delicious! Here. Have some.
The sparkling blue ocean truly accentuates my loveliness.
Let us explore the beach! There is no doubt this summer will be one you won't soon forget!
Yes?
*sigh*
Let's swim!
